scripts.start: AGENTS=${AGENTS:-2} BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(get-port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(get-port) bun run network
scripts.network: hc sandbox clean && bun run build:happ && UI_PORT=$(get-port) concurrently "bun --filter ui start" "bun run launch:happ" "holochain-playground"
scripts.test: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm t -w tests && npm t -w ui && npm run test:status
scripts.test:ui: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm t -w ui
scripts.test:misc: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm t -w tests -- misc
scripts.test:users: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm t -w tests -- users
scripts.test:administration: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm t -w tests -- administration
scripts.test:organizations: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm t -w tests -- organizations
scripts.test:requests: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm t -w tests -- requests-tests
scripts.test:offers: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm t -w tests -- offers-tests
scripts.test:service-types: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm t -w tests -- service-types-tests
scripts.test:service-types:status: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm t -w tests -- service-types-tests/status
scripts.test:service-types:tags: npm run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive && npm t -w tests -- service-types-tests/tag-functionality
scripts.start:tauri: AGENTS=${AGENTS:-2} BOOTSTRAP_PORT=$(get-port) SIGNAL_PORT=$(get-port) npm run network:tauri
scripts.network:tauri: hc sandbox clean && npm run build:happ && UI_PORT=$(get-port) concurrently "npm --filter ui start" "npm run launch:tauri" "holochain-playground"
scripts.launch:tauri: concurrently "hc run-local-services --bootstrap-port $BOOTSTRAP_PORT --signal-port $SIGNAL_PORT" "echo pass | RUST_LOG=warn hc launch --piped -n $AGENTS workdir/requests_and_offers.happ --ui-port $UI_PORT network --bootstrap http://127.0.0.1:"$BOOTSTRAP_PORT" webrtc ws://127.0.0.1:"$SIGNAL_PORT""
scripts.package: bun run build:happ && bun --filter ui package && hc web-app pack workdir --recursive
scripts.build:happ: bun run build:zomes && hc app pack workdir --recursive
